title: Experience Frosty Snow Play at Woodleigh Mall
blurb: Frolic in fluffy snow at Woodleigh Mall's festive display.
description: Step into a winter wonderland right here in Singapore at The Woodleigh Mall's Frosty Snow Play! From December 2nd to 31st, families and children of all ages are invited to revel in a magical festive snow display. Imagine frolicking in soft, fluffy snow, creating unforgettable memories with your loved ones. This enchanting experience is perfect for kids who dream of a white Christmas and parents looking for a unique, joyful activity during the holiday season. Located conveniently at the L1 Entrance near Collin'sÂ®, this delightful snow play area offers a fantastic opportunity for everyone to immerse themselves in the festive spirit. While the experience is subject to weather conditions, it promises a truly special moment for families to bond and enjoy the holiday cheer. Don't miss this chance to experience the joy of snow right in the heart of the mall, making your holiday season extra special and memorable for the whole family. It's a wonderful way to add a touch of magic to your December outings, providing a refreshing and fun escape for children and adults alike.

title: All Aboard the Frosty Express at Woodleigh Mall
blurb: Embark on a magical Christmas journey aboard Frosty Express.
description: Get ready for a enchanting ride on the Frosty Express at The Woodleigh Mall, a delightful Christmas activity perfect for families and children! From December 2nd to 31st, step aboard this magical train located at B1 near Home 360+ and let the festive spirit whisk you away. The Frosty Express promises a journey filled with Christmas wonder, creating cherished memories for kids and parents alike. Operating hours are convenient for all, running Monday to Friday from 5pm to 9pm, and on Saturdays, Sundays, including Public Holidays and eve of Public Holidays, from 12pm to 9pm. This charming attraction is designed to bring joy and excitement to your holiday season, offering a unique and interactive experience for young adventurers. It's an ideal way for families to immerse themselves in the festive atmosphere of the mall, providing a fun and memorable outing that captures the true magic of Christmas. Don't miss the chance to hop on and explore the festive delights!
datetime_display: 2 - 31 Dec | Mon -Fri: 5pm to 9pm | Sat - Sun (Including PH and eve of PH): 12pm to 9pm
